墱字的基本解释

墱
dèng
古同“磴”，台阶或楼梯的层级。
小坎。
排水道：“二十里中作十二墱，墱相去三百步。”

墱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dèng］
［《集韻》丁鄧切，去隥，端。］
石级，自低处向高处的坡道。参见“墱道”、“墱流”。

墱字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　墱； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页239第15
【廣韻】都鄧切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】丁鄧切，?音嶝。小阪也。飛陛謂之墱，閣道也。【張衡·西京賦】墱道邐倚以正東。　又小坎水分派也。【左思·魏都賦】墱流十二，同源異口。【李善曰】鄴下有十二墱，天井優在城西南，分爲十二。　又【集韻】都騰切，音登。墱墱，築牆聲。　墱與隥通。

墱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
墱字的起名意思

同“磴”，台阶或楼梯的层级。

墱
Basic explanation of words
墱
dèng
In ancient times, it is "deng", the level of steps or stairs.
Xiaokan.
Drainage: "Twelve 山 in twenty miles, three hundred steps in 山相."
墱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dèng］
["Ji Yun" Ding Dengqie, Qu Wei, Duan. ]
Stone level, a ramp from low to high. See "墱道", "墱流".
墱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Ministry of Soil Characters] 　墱; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 239 15
[Guang Yun] Du Dengqi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Ding Dengqi,? Yin Deng. Kosaka also. Fei Bi is called the 墱山, the pavilion road also. [Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu] The dynasty relied on the Zhengdong.　It's also a small water school. [Zuo Si·Wei Du Fu] The twelve poems have the same origin and different mouths. [Li Shan said] There are twelve gangs in Yexia, and the courtyard is in the southwest of the city, divided into twelve.　[Jiyun] All Tengqie, Yindeng.墱墱, the sound of building walls.　墱 and 隥通.
墱
